data.persona: I work at the village school. I teach all the children from the ages of 3 to 13. Without me they wouldn't receive a decent education. I am very important in my village.
data.description:
You are in the Meditation room.
The floor and walls are wooden and polished to a shine. Golden meditating statues line the walls, the air is cool and many monks sit still with their eyes closed on mats on the ground. In the far center of the room there is a giant golden Buddha towering over everyone in its pedestal.
There's a mats on the ground, a light, a giant golden Buddha, a statue, and an incense here.
The resting travelers and the monk are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need to complete my daily meditation
data.mid_motivation: I must clear my head before class
data.long_motivation: I need to teach many classes these upcoming months since it is the beginning of the school year
